mapper.sql: t.id, t.name, t.parent_id, t.parent_ids, t.parent_id AS parent_id, p.name AS parent_name, t.ID, t.NAME, t.REMARKS, t.CREATE_BY AS "createBy.id", t.CREATE_DATE, t.UPDATE_BY AS "updateBy.id", t.UPDATE_DATE, t.DEL_FLAG, t.PARENT_ID, t.PARENT_IDS, (select count(*) from TEST_TREE s WHERE s.parent_id=t.id) as hasChildren
LEFT JOIN TEST_TREE p ON p.id = t.parent_id
mapper.update:
update TEST_TREE set parent_ids=CONCAT(#{newParentIds},
substring(parent_ids, length(#{oldParentIds})+1,length(parent_ids)+1))
substr(parent_ids, length(#{oldParentIds})+1,length(parent_ids)+1))
where parent_ids like concat(#{oldParentIds}, '%')
mapper.delete: delete from TEST_TREE where parent_ids like concat(#{oldParentIds}, '%')
